categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military units

nodes.text: Special Forces Command, or SpecCom, was the command element of the Alliance Special Forces. During the Galactic Civil War, the Chief of Special Forces Command was General Crix Madine.

The ship Reekeene's Retribution, which was a resource of the elite Alliance SpecForce team Reekeene's Roughnecks, had a tactical briefing room with a direct communications link with Special Forces Command.
